name: Mighty Cleave
description: You wield the light that has accumulated atop your head to cleave the target. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d8 + MOVE rock damage on a hit. This move hits and deals damage even through moves/abilities that would negate it, such as Protect, Spiky Shield, etc.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
